help_security_vpn.lang_hsv1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_security_vpn.lang_hsv4: The VPN client(s) on the local network can establish an IPSec VPN tunnel through the Router.
help_security_vpn.lang_hsv6: The VPN client(s) on the local network can establish a PPTP VPN tunnel through the Router.
help_security_vpn.lang_hsv8: The VPN client(s) on the local network can establish an L2TP VPN tunnel through the Router.
help_security_vpn.lang_hsv9: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
